articles.author: Drew Richardson
articles.title: Kraft recalls 84,000 cases of American cheese slices over choking hazard - CNBC
articles.description: Kraft Heinz announced a recall of Kraft Singles cheese slices after customers complained of choking.
articles.content:
Zoom In Icon
Arrows pointing outwards
Kraft Heinz recalled nearly 84,000 cases of Kraft Singles cheese slices on Tuesday after multiple customers reported a choking hazard.
The food giant received… [+1666 chars]
